Title: Relates to establishing a tax on carbon emissions and to establishing the carbon tax revenue fund
Summary: Establishes a tax on carbon emissions and the carbon tax revenue fund; establishes an excise tax on carbon-based fuel sold in the state; establishes an initial rate of five dollars per ton of carbon.
LawCode: Add Art 21-B §§530 - 534, amd §171, Tax L; add §99-ff, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax on carbon emissions; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the carbon tax revenue fund
